title: Tour de France Stage 1: Romain Bardet Defies the Bunch for First Yellow Jersey in Nailbiter Final
content:
Pogačar, Vingegaard, Roglič, Evenepoel finish together after reduced sprint; Cavendish sick on bike, suffers in gruppetto in tough start to 'Project 35'.

Read the full article at Tour de France Stage 1: Romain Bardet Defies the Bunch for First Yellow Jersey in Nailbiter Final on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
